item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, August 30, 2024 at 11:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Rearchiving 2M hours of digital radio, a comprehensive process (40 points | 2 comments)

3. Bypassing airport security via SQL injection (1630 points | 348 comments)

9. Pie doesn't need to be original (unless you claim it so) (14 points | 10 comments)

25. Anthropic's Prompt Engineering Interactive Tutorial (226 points | 55 comments)
26. Raspberry Pi Pico does line rate 100M Ethernet (210 points | 46 comments)
27. Show HN: bpfquery – experimenting with compiling SQL to bpf(trace) (18 points | 4 comments)
28. Scpptool – a tool to enforce a memory and data race safe subset of C++ (3 points | discuss)
29. Poly (YC S22) is hiring Rust experts in SF to build "Arc browser for files" ( | hide)
30. Show HN: A discovery-focused search engine for Hacker News (154 points | 26 comments)
